statement.tex: \\ \text{If R be the radius of the circle, then}\\ \text{we have been told that}\ldots
\\ \text{If C be the circumference of the circle, then}\ldots

reason.tex: \text{The circumference of a circle is given by } C = 2\pi\cdot R.\\ \text{And therefore, }\dfrac{dC}{dt} = 2\pi\dfrac{dR}{dt}.
